name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Terran, one language of its creator's choice

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

actions.name: Maul.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6).
descriptions: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 16 (3d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
